learning_outcomes: Understand and use B1 Inventions and Creators vocabulary
Apply B1 grammar structures in context

content.prompt_es: Une cada término con su definición correspondiente:

pairs.right: The act of finding or learning something for the first time
A way of carrying out a particular task
A stock or supply of money, materials, staff
